Title: A decisive battle determines victory - Strike against the American aggressor
Designer: Zheng Tongxiao (郑通校)Lu Yifei (陆一飞)Wang Weixin (王维新)Dong Lianbao (董连宝)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: This edition was made for international distribution, with the title in Vietnamese:QUYẾT CHIẾN QUYẾT THẮNG , ĐÁNH BỌN XÂM LƯỢC MỸ
